page.title: 09 INDUSTRY
page.content: In our area we have several light engineering industries situated near the canal. However none of the factories use the canal. Some of the factories moved from the City Centre due to bomb damage caused during the war. By far the biggest company was Laughtons which employs 725 people. Other firms make wire etc., bar equipment and other small factories deal in printing. On average most companies worked a nine hour day with an hour or half-hour lunch-break. The INDUSTRY in this area employs mainly women doing manual tasks. The ratio of women to men was 7 to 1.
